Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Had first career hit (triple) on 8/10/1988, off Dave Stewart (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/10/1988, off Don August (CIN)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Atlanta on 5/28/1989...
Traded from San Diego to Detroit on 7/5/1990 (Going to SD: P Jeff Brantley. Going to DET: LF Moises Alou, P Bob Sebra, P Greg W. Harris)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/1991, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 9/8/1991...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,550,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,550,000 through salary arbitration...
